Articles.Content:
There seriously needs to be KSP on the next group of consoles coming out.

I can't see the coding and everything else being that difficult considering what the devs have already accomplished, so SOMEONE GET ON THIS!!!!
I doubt it would even be considered. Indie Developers rarely port their games over to Consoles.
No, the game is honestly too complicated for primitive console controllers. The construction phase would be FRUSTRATING with the gamepad.

Why, it would be even worse than having it on Steam. When it came out on Steam, eventually all the stupid noob started to be less stupid. On the console, they would simply refuse to go away, it would be like the current Minecraft forums.

scrolls with rb to propulusion, goes to next page, needs to pick it with the stick, a, place it in symetry... a capsule with 3 srbs would take 10 minutes to make. NOOOOO!

and lobsterbark has right.

Actually porting to consoles takes plenty of effort and the game is nowhere near complete anyway.

Possibly when it's complete but it probably wouldn't work too well on consoles anyway.
How can you even consider making a game as complex and with that many keys needed as KSP on consoles!?!??
